headline: Does BNY Mellon's (BK) Blockchain Deposit Pilot Signal a Turning Point in Its Digital Strategy?
summary: In recent days, Bank of New York Mellon announced it is piloting tokenized deposits as part of its continued push to modernize its payments infrastructure using blockchain technology. This development aligns with a wider industry shift as more major banks seek faster, more efficient cross-border transactions leveraging blockchain. This move highlights how BNY Mellon is preparing to support real-time settlement and potentially lower transaction costs, key considerations as digital assets...
